rdf:Description.dc:title: Planning for an evaluation of teaching performance 1985
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Yuzdepski, I.
Elliot, L.
Alberta. Alberta Education. Planning Services.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Prepared by I. Yuzdepski and L. Elliot.
Available on ERIC fiche (ED 270 402) in MAIN.

1. A manual of guidelines. -- 2. Teacher effectiveness: annotated bibliography and references. -- 3. Evaluation procedures: annotated bibliography and references. -- 4. Summaries of instruments for use in evaluating teaching performance.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Teachers
